misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
Finally made his first hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, after 20 years of trying.
biography: Harri, affectionately known as "the doctor" among his peers, brings a wealth of experience to the greens of the Hector Trophée. Representing Hattula Golf, Harri is set to make his sixth appearance at the prestigious tournament in 2025.

Despite his age, Harri is renowned for his prodigious drives, a testament to his enduring power and skill. His dedication to the sport is evident in his relentless pursuit of perfection, culminating in his first-ever hole-in-one on May 24th, 2025, after two decades of unwavering effort.

With two past Hector Trophée victories under his belt, Harri is a formidable competitor, always a threat to be reckoned with. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his focus remains steadfast on contributing to a successful team performance. His participation in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025 is highly anticipated.
